Package ui

Class UserInterface

java.lang.Object
ui.UserInterface
public class UserInterface extends Object
UserInterface is the class that communicates with users. It works together with the class DataCenterSystem.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserInterface

      public UserInterface()
      Constructor of the class. It initializes the necessary Scanner object and sets exit to false.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method of the project
      Parameters:
      args - String[]

    • initializeSystem

      public void initializeSystem()
      Initializes the DataCenterSystem object necessary to meet the requirements. The values of its attributes are entered by the user.

    • enableFunctions

      public void enableFunctions()
      Verifies that the DataCenterSystem object exists and launches a menu. The first time it will launch main menu and if currentMenu changes it will launch the launch menu.

    • mainMenu

      public void mainMenu()
      Main menu of the program. It allows acces to main functionalities and the simulation menu.

    • simulationMenu

      public void simulationMenu()
      Submenu that groups the functionalities related to simulations protocols. It asks the user to choose an option. When called it will first make a copy of the current state of each mini rooms because it starts a simulation, therefore it does not affect the actual state of them.

    • showOptionsMenu

      public int showOptionsMenu(String title, String message, String[] options)
      Prints a custom menu. It asks the user to select one of its options until it receive a valid option.
      Parameters:
      title - String to be displayed as the title of the menu.
      message - String to be displayed as a message of the menu.
      options - String[] to be displayed as options of the menu. It includes the number of each option automatically.
      Returns:
      option int corresponding to the option selected by the user.

    • showOptions

      public int showOptions(String message, String[] options)
      Works exactly as showOptionsMenu, the only difference is the look and that it does not have return / exit option.
      Parameters:
      message - String to be displayed as a message of the menu.
      options - String[] to be displayed as options of the menu. It includes the number of each option automatically.
      Returns:
      option int corresponding to the option selected by the user.

    • showProtocolMenu

      public void showProtocolMenu(String message, String[] options)
      It only prints an String array as an option list. It is used specifically for the protocol menu.
      Parameters:
      message - String to be displayed as a message of the menu.
      options - String[] to be displayed as options of the menu.

    • showAvailableMiniRoomsList

      public void showAvailableMiniRoomsList()
      Shows the list of the available mini rooms.

    • rentMiniRoom

      public void rentMiniRoom()
      Perfoms the necessary operations to rent a mini room. It will ask the user to enter the desired location of the mini room. Then, if the selected one is available it will need more information and it will vary depending on the type of tenant (external company or university itself). The arrays are used to send all the attributes values to the controller object, the controller will use them to create the Server objects.

    • cancelRental

      public void cancelRental()
      Perfoms the necessary operations to cancel the rental of a specific mini room. It will ask the user to enter an id. The id of a mini room is given after succesfully renting it in the system (rentMiniRoom method). It will first verify the selected mini room is already rented.

    • cancelCompanyRental

      public void cancelCompanyRental()
      Perfoms the necessary operations to cancel all the rentals of a specific company. It will ask the user to enter the name of the company. It will first verify the entered one exists in the system.

    • showCenterMap

      public void showCenterMap()
      Shows a map of the data center with the current state of the mini rooms.
